CardData.FlavorText: "You have come and are here met, in this very nick of time, by chance as it may seem. Yet it is not so. Believe rather that it is so ordered that we, who sit here, and none others, must now find counsel for the peril of the world. " â€”Gandalf, The Fellowship of the Ring

Localization.Title: CommonCause
Localization.Text: Exhaust an Ally to ready another Character
